TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IXamlNameProvider

summary.span: 提供服務，這個服務會在儲存及寫入作業期間用來輸入物件和傳回 XAML 名稱。

span.span: Provides a service that is used during save and write operations to input an object and return a XAML name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項服務，才會相關的儲存路徑作業，例如當序列化屬性的值轉換器的用法，以及型別轉換子或值序列化程式支援序列化。This service is only relevant for a save path operation, such as when a serializes an attributed value converter usage, and the type converter or value serializer supports serialization. A不會提供其服務內容中的服務。A does not provide the service in its service context. 型別轉換子或值序列化程式可以存取此服務做為服務提供者使用可用的結構描述內容，然後取得實作該內容中的服務。A type converter or value serializer can access this service by using an available schema context as a service provider and then obtaining the service that is implemented in that context. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[類型轉換器和 XAML 的標記延伸](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/type-converters-and-markup-extensions-for-xaml.md)和[適用於類型轉換器和標記延伸](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/service-contexts-available-to-type-converters-and-markup-extensions.md)。For more information, see [Type Converters and Markup Extensions for XAML](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/type-converters-and-markup-extensions-for-xaml.md) and [Service Contexts Available to Type Converters and Markup Extensions](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/service-contexts-available-to-type-converters-and-markup-extensions.md). 若要正確地使用 XAML 定義的名稱，您可能也需要取得動作的相關資訊的 XAML 名稱範圍和值，表示它。To correctly use XAML-defined names, you may also need to obtain information about the acting XAML namescope and the value that represents it.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetName(object value) cil managed
Public Function GetName (value As Object) As String

span.span: The object to get the name for.

summary.span: 擷取指定物件的 XAML 名稱。

span.span: Retrieves the XAML name of the specified object.

returns.span: 要求之物件的 XAML 名稱值。

span.span: The XAML name value of the requested object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設的.NET Framework XAML 服務實作依賴可以報告在執行階段物件圖形中使用的物件名稱的 XAML 結構描述內容。The default .NET Framework XAML Services implementation relies on a XAML schema context that can report the object names being used in the runtime object graph.
